data.title: Inner C Site Delay Dark Cover from C Hall
data.description: Use this Dark Cover to make it more difficult for enemy players to take control of inner C Site, and force them to use more risky, or more costly tactics to take control of Site.

data.title: B Main Dark Cover to Contest Space
data.description: Use this early round Dark Cover to make it more difficult for the Attackers to take space in B main, this can be done at any point in the round - but can consistently provide more info and control when used at the beginning of the round. Combo it with a paranoia if you think that will increase your team's ability to rotate and respond to the enemy team's efforts in B Main if needed.

data.title: B Upper Retake / Delay for B Main
data.description: This is used ideally right as the enemy team is pushing into B Site, so that you can make it much more difficult for the enemy team to follow through with their execute, while also setting you and your team up for easy picks.
